text: Kampala is the capital of Uganda. More than 1,800,000 people live there. The city is on the shore of Lake Victoria. The Ugandan National Theatre is in Kampala. There is also a university in the city. The home team; Kampala City Council (KCC) Football Club is a leading Africa FIFA Club team player. This is where Ugandan QUentin TArintino is ==References== Category:National capitals in Africa Category:Settlements in Uganda Category:1890 establishments
title: Kampala
